features: Reach for these extra-strong baby wipes during diaper changes, feedings, or playtime; soft and convenient, these disposable wipes are ideal for a variety of clean-up jobs
The moist wipes work like strong, fluffy washcloths and help soothe and soften your baby’s delicate skin
Infused with Vitamin E and aloe, these baby wipes help keep your little one's sensitive skin soft and smooth; they are alcohol-free to avoid irritation, and are made of an embossed spunlace material
A powder soft fragrance gives the wipes a pleasant scent, while the flip-top lid makes it easy to dispense wipes and keeps the pack from drying out when not in use
Each wipe measures 6.8 inches x 7 inches, a generous surface area for cleaning; please note, these wipes are not flushable

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: McKesson Baby Wipes with Vitamin E and Aloe, Unscented or Scented McKesson Baby Wipes are a simple solution for clean-ups during diaper changes, meals and playtime. Made with an extra-strong spunlace construction to handle serious messes, these soothing baby cleaning wipes are infused with aloe and vitamin E to keep baby’s skin soft and healthy. McKesson soft wipes are unscented or scented and alcohol-free. At a Glance: Unscented or scented baby wipes made with aloe and vitamin E to help keep baby’s skin softWipes measure 6.8 by 7 inches (17.3 cm by 17.8 cm)Durable 50 grams per square meter(gsm) large emboss spunlace constructionBaby wipes pack features a flip-top lid to keep wipes moist when not in use

Aloe and Vitamin E Help Support Soft Skin McKesson Baby Wipes are specially formulated for a baby’s sensitive skin, with aloe vera and vitamin E to help soothe and soften the skin with each use. These soft baby wipes are made with no added scents and are alcohol free to help keep skin from drying out or becoming irritated. Each wipe is intended for single use. Reusable Flip-Top Container McKesson Baby Wipes come packaged in a soft pack with a flip-top lid that offers easy dispensing and keeps the contents from drying out. Each pack contains 72 baby wipes that measure 6.8 by 7 inches (17.3 cm by 17.8 cm). This product is not made with natural rubber latex. Great for A Variety of Cleanup Jobs Thanks to a durable spunlace construction, you can use these baby wipes for cleaning up messes on kids of any age, not just babies. The moist wipes work just like strong, fluffy washcloths, letting you quickly and easily wipe off dirty faces after meals, clean up messes during diaper changes or take care of filthy hands after playtime.

About McKesson: In Business for Better Health For over 180 years, McKesson has supported providers with the medical supplies they need to care for patients and run a healthy business. McKesson offers more than 300,000 products from leading national brands as well as its own private product label, and a suite of services to help businesses and facilities provide quality care, improve business performance and manage time and expenses. McKesson improves the business of healthcare to help everyone focus on what matters most: patient health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars soft on baby skin
reviews.reviewText: soft cloth like wipe, good size, nice baby powder smell..not overwhelming, nice dispenser pack

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, gentle and great scent
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t buy these for a baby - they’re for me to use on the derrière. These wipes are really soft and just the right amount of moistness. Also the baby powder scent is mild. I purchased a few more packages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars These do not smell like Baby Power
reviews.reviewText: I was hoping to find a pleasant baby powder scented wipe, and these do not. It's a weird smell. I really liked the ones I bought at Walmart, Parent's Choice powder fresh scent wipes, however, I haven't been able to find them either in the store or online. I'm not sure if they were discontinued for whatever reason. I am sorry I bought 3 packages. Maybe I will give them away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shipped as stated
reviews.reviewText: Great product from a well known company.
